summary: Manages the lifecycle and configuration of a payment receiver, constructing the receiver instance, generating BIP‑21 URIs from Tor onion hostnames, handling default callbacks, exposing the receiving address, initiating communication, processing incoming payment proposals, and performing orderly shutdown.
business_intent: Provide a streamlined way for applications to set up and run a secure cryptocurrency payment receiver over Tor, handling address creation and proposal processing for end‑users.
